content.text:
I'll start by exploring the repository structure to understand the codebase and then be ready to assist with your requirements.
<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">find /home/stanner/Documents/Code/mcp_servers_custom/alienvault-mcp-server -type f -name "*.py" | head -20</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">ls -la /home/stanner/Documents/Code/mcp_servers_custom/alienvault-mcp-server/</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">cat /home/stanner/Documents/Code/mcp_servers_custom/alienvault-mcp-server/.mcp.json 2>/dev/null || echo "File not found"</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">head -50 /home/stanner/Documents/Code/mcp_servers_custom/alienvault-mcp-server/alienvault_server.py</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">wc -l /home/stanner/Documents/Code/mcp_servers_custom/alienvault-mcp-server/alienvault_server.py</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">cat /home/stanner/Documents/Code/mcp_servers_custom/alienvault-mcp-server/alienvault_server.py</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">find /home/stanner/Documents/Code/mcp_servers_custom/alienvault-mcp-server -type f \( -name "*.md" -o -name "*.txt" -o -name "*.json" \) 2>/dev/null</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">git -C /home/stanner/Documents/Code/mcp_servers_custom/alienvault-mcp-server log --oneline -10</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">git -C /home/stanner/Documents/Code/mcp_servers_custom/alienvault-mcp-server diff alienvault_server.py</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>

## Warmup Complete

I'm ready to assist with your requirements. I've explored the repository structure and understand:

1. **Project Type**: AlienVault MCP Server - a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server implementation
2. **Current State**: The `alienvault_server.py` file has been modified (staged changes) and there's a `.mcp.json` configuration file
3. **Structure**: This appears to be a Python-based MCP server that will integrate with Claude for security threat intelligence

I can now:
- Explore the codebase in detail using read-only operations
- Design implementation plans based on requirements
- Identify patterns and architectural decisions
- Create step-by-step implementation strategies

Please provide your requirements or the task you'd like me to help with, and I'll create a comprehensive implementation plan while following the read-only constraint.
